-->

**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line: 
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**:

The `GetDeviceMountPath` method for ceph rbd volume plugin generates the path with code as follows:

```go
func makePDNameInternal(host volume.VolumeHost, pool string, image string) string {
	return path.Join(host.GetPluginDir(rbdPluginName), "rbd", pool+"-image-"+image)
}
```

So the device mount path's format will be:  `{pluginName}/rbd/...`, this implementation has two problems:

1. Inconsistent with other volume plugins, as all the other plugins return `{pluginName}/mounts/...`, see [EBS](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/da9a4d5da9ecc6f687c873fb990d662b1f9f98b2/pkg/volume/aws_ebs/aws_ebs.go#L387) as an example.

2. The `ConstructVolumeSpec` method of ceph rbd plugin is not working properly, because rbd plugin uses [getDeviceNameFromMount](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/da9a4d5da9ecc6f687c873fb990d662b1f9f98b2/pkg/util/mount/mount_linux.go#L342) method to find the device mount path(just like all the other plugins do), and `getDeviceNameFromMount` method assumes the device mount path's format is `{pluginName}/mounts/...`(see [this line](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/da9a4d5da9ecc6f687c873fb990d662b1f9f98b2/pkg/util/mount/mount_linux.go#L352)).

**What you expected to happen**:

The device mount path of rbd plugin should be `{pluginName}/mounts/...`.

**Anything else we need to know?**:

Do we have any reason for this design? If not, I will submit a PR to fix this, the adjusted `makePDNameInternal` method maybe look like this:

```go
func makePDNameInternal(host volume.VolumeHost, pool string, image string) string {
	// Backward compatibility for the old path format:
	// /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/kubernetes.io/rbd/rbd/pool-image-image
	legacyDir := path.Join(host.GetPluginDir(rbdPluginName), "rbd", pool+"-image-"+image)
	info, err := os.Stat(legacyDir)
	if err == nil && info.IsDir() {
		// The device mount path has already been created with the old format, return it.
		return legacyDir
	}
	// Return the new format path.
	return path.Join(host.GetPluginDir(rbdPluginName), mount.MountsInGlobalPDPath, pool+"-image-"+image)
}
```

/sig storage
